This game is quality the amount of prestige you get from being good at this game will make the women flock to you. Even better is all the hackers who head shot you through walls, the people that poop on you by kicking you immediately, especially the Russians. Most enjoyable moments include getting bands when your friends kick you for no reasons and constantly keybind spamming poop and "If you're good at something, never do it for free." (Joker, Batman The Darknight Rises) The gambling in this game surpasses anything Las Vegas could ever dream to have since its just that amazing. So long as you have food and water you will never have to leave your house again to feel successful after a day of smurfing and bullying small children.

Great online gambling platform. Team will kick you for the bot slot. Playing with randoms is like using your head to hammer roofing nails. If you are capable of getting angry, you will, that is a fact. A gamer girl reported my squad to the news. Occasionally a guy with walls drops your rank down and you have to work at it again. Overall, a great way to bully small children and an excellent choice for the avid JOKER (tm) fan.

This game is a lot of fun despite the fact that it is frustrating sometimes, and even if you don't plan on taking it too seriously everyone wears mics and tries to play together even in lower levels. It's great working on your skills and doing your best to win competitive matches. For $20 (or free now but that risks some cheating) this game's value is unmatched.

Un juego totalmente distinto a los clásicos del CS antiguos sin embargo y con una jugabilidad casi nueva,  Counter-Strike global onfessive es un juego demasiado completo y bueno,  como para pasar el rato jugando partidas casuales en dead match o para jugar más mucho más en serio en el match making competitivo,  ya sea solo o en un equipo con amigos así mismo tiene una gran cantidad de jugadores al nivel mundial y todo un circuito de e sports profesional con los equipos tops del mundo y jugadores que han marcado la historia en el Counter-Strike.
